test_cases.test_name: Custom API Integration Verification
test_cases.objective: Verify the functionality of custom APIs developed for real-time data exchange with wearable devices and AI-based image analysis systems.

test_steps.action: Initiate data transmission from wearable device to CTMS via custom API.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is received and processed by CTMS within 5 minutes.

test_steps.action: Send image analysis results from AI system to CTMS via custom API.
test_steps.expected_result: Image analysis data is integrated into CTMS and available in relevant dashboards.

acceptance_criteria: All data transmissions are successful
Data integrity is maintained

test_cases.test_name: Custom Dashboard Functionality Check
test_cases.objective: Validate the functionality and accuracy of custom dashboards with advanced visualizations.

test_steps.action: Access custom dashboard for patient enrollment tracking.
test_steps.expected_result: Dashboard displays accurate enrollment data with advanced visualizations.

test_steps.action: Generate a specialized report combining CTMS data with external real-world evidence.
test_steps.expected_result: Report is generated within 30 minutes and contains accurate combined data.

acceptance_criteria: Dashboards display accurate data
Reports are generated within specified time

test_cases.test_name: Custom API Integration with Wearable Devices
test_cases.objective: Verify the successful integration of custom APIs for real-time data exchange with wearable devices.

test_steps.action: Configure the custom API endpoint in the CTMS platform.
test_steps.expected_result: API endpoint is successfully configured and accessible.

test_steps.action: Send test data from a wearable device to the CTMS platform.
test_steps.expected_result: Test data is received and processed by the CTMS platform.

test_steps.action: Verify the data is displayed correctly in the CTMS dashboard.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is accurately displayed in the CTMS dashboard.

acceptance_criteria: API endpoint is configured correctly
Data is received and processed without errors
Data is accurately displayed in the dashboard

test_cases.test_name: Custom Encryption Implementation Verification
test_cases.objective: Validate the implementation of custom encryption for data sovereignty compliance.

test_steps.action: Configure the custom encryption module in the CTMS platform.
test_steps.expected_result: Encryption module is successfully configured and active.

test_steps.action: Encrypt test data using the custom encryption module.
test_steps.expected_result: Test data is encrypted without errors.

test_steps.action: Decrypt the encrypted test data using the custom encryption module.
test_steps.expected_result: Test data is decrypted accurately to its original form.

acceptance_criteria: Encryption module is configured correctly
Data is encrypted and decrypted without errors
Decrypted data matches the original data
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity during encryption and decryption

test_cases.test_name: Custom API Integration Verification
test_cases.objective: Verify the functionality and reliability of custom APIs developed for real-time data exchange with wearable devices and AI-based image analysis systems.

test_steps.action: Initiate data transmission from wearable devices to CTMS via custom API.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is successfully transmitted and logged in CTMS.

test_steps.action: Send image analysis results from AI system to CTMS via custom API.
test_steps.expected_result: Image analysis data is accurately received and integrated into CTMS.

acceptance_criteria: All data transmissions are successful and accurate.
No data loss or corruption during transmission.

test_cases.test_name: Custom Dashboard Functionality Check
test_cases.objective: Validate the functionality and accuracy of custom dashboards with advanced visualizations developed for CTMS.

test_steps.action: Access custom dashboard and verify all visualizations are displayed correctly.
test_steps.expected_result: All visualizations are accurately rendered and functional.

test_steps.action: Interact with dashboard elements to test responsiveness and data accuracy.
test_steps.expected_result: Dashboard elements respond correctly and display accurate data.

acceptance_criteria: All visualizations are accurate and functional.
Dashboard interactions are responsive and correct.

test_cases.test_name: Custom API Integration Verification
test_cases.objective: Verify the functionality and reliability of custom APIs developed for real-time data exchange with wearable devices, AI-based image analysis systems, and proprietary biomarker databases.

test_steps.action: Initiate API connection with wearable device simulator.
test_steps.expected_result: Successful connection and data transmission.

test_steps.action: Send test data to AI-based image analysis system.
test_steps.expected_result: Accurate analysis results returned within expected time frame.

test_steps.action: Query proprietary biomarker database using API.
test_steps.expected_result: Correct biomarker data retrieved.

acceptance_criteria: All APIs function as intended
Data integrity maintained
Performance meets requirements

test_cases.test_name: Custom Dashboard Functionality Check
test_cases.objective: Validate the functionality and accuracy of custom dashboards with advanced visualizations.

test_steps.action: Log in to the CTMS and navigate to custom dashboards.
test_steps.expected_result: Successful login and dashboard access.

test_steps.action: Select various visualization options and verify display.
test_steps.expected_result: Visualizations display correctly and accurately.

test_steps.action: Filter data using dashboard controls and verify results.
test_steps.expected_result: Filtered data matches expected results.

acceptance_criteria: Dashboards function as intended
Visualizations are accurate
Performance meets requirements

test_cases.test_name: Custom API Integration Test for Real-Time Wearable Data Exchange
test_cases.objective: Verify the functionality of custom APIs for real-time data exchange with wearable devices as specified in URS-CTMS-005.

test_steps.action: Configure wearable device simulator to send test data packets.
test_steps.expected_result: Simulator successfully connects to the CTMS API endpoint.

test_steps.action: Send simulated wearable data to the CTMS API.
test_steps.expected_result: CTMS receives and processes the data within 5 seconds.

test_steps.action: Verify data appears in the designated CTMS dashboard.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is visible in the dashboard within 5 minutes of receipt.

acceptance_criteria: All test data packets are successfully received and processed by CTMS
Dashboard updates occur within specified timeframes
No data corruption occurs during transmission
data_integrity_requirements: End-to-end data integrity must be maintained

test_cases.test_name: Regulatory Inspection Readiness Package Generation Test
test_cases.objective: Validate the system's ability to automatically generate complete regulatory inspection readiness packages per URS-CTMS-018.
prerequisites: CTMS populated with sample trial data

test_steps.action: Initiate inspection package generation for a simulated FDA inspection.
test_steps.expected_result: System confirms package generation request and provides estimated completion time.

test_steps.action: Verify package contents against regulatory requirements.
test_steps.expected_result: Package contains all required documents including audit trails, protocol deviations, and monitoring reports.

test_steps.action: Validate electronic signatures on critical documents.
test_steps.expected_result: All required documents contain valid electronic signatures with proper attribution.

acceptance_criteria: Package generation completes within 30 minutes
All required regulatory documents are included
Electronic signatures meet 21 CFR Part 11 requirements
data_integrity_requirements: Package contents must be exact representations of system data
No modifications possible during generation process

test_cases.test_name: Custom API Integration with Wearable Devices
test_cases.objective: Verify the functionality of custom APIs for real-time data exchange with wearable devices.
prerequisites: Wearable device connected to the system

test_steps.action: Send test data from a wearable device to the CTMS via the custom API.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is received and processed by the CTMS without errors.

acceptance_criteria: Data is accurately received and processed within the expected timeframe.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity during transmission and processing.

test_cases.test_name: Custom Encryption Verification for Data Sovereignty
test_cases.objective: Validate the custom encryption implementation for data sovereignty compliance.

test_steps.action: Encrypt test data using the custom encryption module.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is encrypted according to the specified encryption standards.

acceptance_criteria: Data is securely encrypted and meets the required standards for data sovereignty.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data remains secure and unaltered during encryption.

test_cases.test_name: Custom API Integration Test for Real-Time Wearable Data Exchange
test_cases.objective: Verify the functionality of custom APIs for real-time data exchange with wearable devices as specified in URS-CTMS-005.

test_steps.action: Configure the wearable device simulator to send test data packets.
test_steps.expected_result: Simulator successfully connects to the CTMS API endpoint.

test_steps.action: Send a series of test data packets from the simulator to the CTMS.
test_steps.expected_result: CTMS receives and processes the data packets without errors.

test_steps.action: Verify the data is correctly displayed in the CTMS dashboard.
test_steps.expected_result: Dashboard updates within 5 minutes with the test data as per URS-CTMS-020.

acceptance_criteria: All test data packets are received and processed by the CTMS.
Dashboard updates within the specified 5-minute window.
No data corruption or loss during transmission.
data_integrity_requirements: Data must remain intact and unaltered during transmission.
All data exchanges must be logged for audit purposes.

test_cases.test_name: Custom Adaptive Trial Design Module Validation
test_cases.objective: Validate the functionality of the custom adaptive trial design module as per URS-CTMS-003 and URS-CTMS-008.

test_steps.action: Load a test adaptive trial protocol into the CTMS.
test_steps.expected_result: Protocol is successfully loaded and recognized by the system.

test_steps.action: Simulate patient enrollment and data input to trigger adaptive algorithm.
test_steps.expected_result: System correctly applies the adaptive algorithm and updates trial parameters.

test_steps.action: Verify the system generates appropriate notifications for protocol changes.
test_steps.expected_result: Notifications are sent to relevant stakeholders as configured.

acceptance_criteria: Adaptive algorithm executes correctly based on input data.
Trial parameters are updated as expected.
Notifications are generated and sent without errors.
data_integrity_requirements: All algorithm inputs and outputs must be logged.
Protocol changes must be traceable to specific data inputs.

test_cases.test_name: Custom API Integration with Wearable Devices
test_cases.objective: Verify the custom API integration with wearable devices for real-time data exchange.

test_steps.action: Send test data from wearable device to CTMS via API.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is received and processed by CTMS without errors.

acceptance_criteria: Data is accurately received and processed by CTMS.
No errors in API logs.

test_cases.test_name: Custom Dashboards with Advanced Visualizations
test_cases.objective: Validate the functionality and accuracy of custom dashboards with advanced visualizations.

test_steps.action: Access the custom dashboard and verify the displayed data.
test_steps.expected_result: Dashboard displays accurate and up-to-date data.

acceptance_criteria: Dashboard displays accurate data.
Visualizations are correct and functional.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity in dashboard displays.

test_cases.test_name: Custom API Integration with Wearable Devices
test_cases.objective: Verify the functionality of custom APIs for real-time data exchange with wearable devices.
prerequisites: Wearable device connected to the system

test_steps.action: Initiate data transmission from the wearable device.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is received by the CTMS within 5 seconds.

acceptance_criteria: Data is accurately received and processed by the CTMS.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity during transmission and processing.

test_cases.test_name: Custom Encryption Verification for Data Sovereignty
test_cases.objective: Ensure custom encryption is correctly implemented for data sovereignty compliance.

test_steps.action: Encrypt a sample data set using the custom encryption method.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is encrypted according to the specified encryption standards.

acceptance_criteria: Data is securely encrypted and meets data sovereignty requirements.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data remains secure and unaltered during encryption.

test_cases.test_name: Custom API Integration Test for Real-Time Wearable Data Exchange
test_cases.objective: Verify the functionality of custom APIs for real-time data exchange with wearable devices as specified in URS-CTMS-005.
prerequisites: CTMS system is installed and operational

test_steps.action: Configure the wearable device simulator to send test data to the CTMS API endpoint.
test_steps.expected_result: Simulator successfully connects to the API endpoint and sends test data.

test_steps.action: Verify that the CTMS system receives and processes the wearable device data in real-time.
test_steps.expected_result: CTMS system displays the received data on the dashboard within 5 minutes.

acceptance_criteria: API successfully receives and processes wearable device data
Data is displayed on the dashboard within the specified time frame
data_integrity_requirements: Data must be encrypted during transmission
Data must be accurately reflected in the CTMS system

test_cases.test_name: Regulatory Inspection Readiness Package Generation Test
test_cases.objective: Validate the system's ability to automatically generate regulatory inspection readiness packages as per URS-CTMS-018.
prerequisites: Sample clinical trial data is loaded
User with appropriate permissions is logged in

test_steps.action: Navigate to the regulatory inspection readiness module and initiate package generation.
test_steps.expected_result: System prompts for required parameters and confirms initiation of package generation.

test_steps.action: Verify the generated package contains all required documents and data as per regulatory standards.
test_steps.expected_result: Package is generated within 30 minutes and includes all necessary documents and data.

acceptance_criteria: Package is generated within the specified time frame
Package includes all required regulatory documents and data
data_integrity_requirements: Data must be complete and accurate
Documents must be unaltered and traceable
